headline.main: LearnVest, Merrill Edge and Financial Planning for the Middle Class

docs.snippet: Bucks readers talk about their experience in working with LearnVest and Merrill Edge....
docs.abstract: Bucks readers talk about their experience in working with LearnVest and Merrill Edge.
docs.lead_paragraph: In this weekend's Your Money column, I return to a topic that I've come at in various ways in recent years: The question of how the merely middle class and semi-affluent among us can get good, ethical, reasonably priced financial advice without having to watch our backs and our wallets.

headline.main: TPG Is Said to Consider $1 Billion Investment in Olympus

docs.snippet: TPG, the private equity firm, has reached out to a number of potential partners, though it has not yet decided whether it will pursue an investment, according to a person briefed on the matter....
docs.abstract: TPG, the private equity firm, has reached out to a number of potential partners, though it has not yet decided whether it will pursue an investment, according to a person briefed on the matter.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

docs.lead_paragraph: TPG Capital is weighing a potential investment in the Olympus Corporation of Japan, in which it would join with a strategic partner to invest as much as $1 billion, a person briefed on the matter said on Friday.

docs.lead_paragraph: This week Martha Rose Shulman encourages home cooks to get more creative with apples, taking her recipes beyond traditional dishes like applesauce and apple pie. She also encourages home chefs to leave the skin on when possible.
